body_html: This is actually not really a question about PyTorch, I wasn't using it (although I am using it for other projects!)- it's about the driver. I think this is a driver bug, and we hit it after a grid upgrade (it's with Tesla K10s and 387.26 driver, and it doesn't happen reproducibly). So I wanted to find from @arijitx what his GPU device and driver version were to see whether there is a clear pattern. (BTW, hi-- we met for lunch at Gertrude's when you visited CLSP.)

body: This is actually not really a question about PyTorch, I wasn't using it (although I am using it for other projects!)- it's about the driver.  I think this is a driver bug, and we hit it after a grid upgrade (it's with Tesla K10s and 387.26 driver, and it doesn't happen reproducibly).  So I wanted to find from @arijitx what his GPU device and driver version were to see whether there is a clear pattern.  (BTW, hi-- we met for lunch at Gertrude's when you visited CLSP.)
